title: Prologue
description:
“I don’t dream about him for weeks. And then, there he is, woven into my sleep.” 
A story about losing the man you love and going on without him; about raising two girls through grief, being alone and surviving - mostly intact. 
Chapter 1 will be available from 12 October 2020.
itunes:subtitle: “I don’t dream about him for weeks. And then, there he is, woven into my sleep.”
